ðŸ“– Summary: Spongecake is a framework for building AI agents that can interact with computers. It allows developers to automate workflows, scrape data, and fill out forms in both web and desktop applications. It is particularly useful for automating tasks in environments with limited APIs or on-premise infrastructure.
